name: spotify_clone
description: A spotify clone app for learning purpose Frontend: React, Zustand, Typescript, Tailwind, Shadcn. Backend: ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose, Clerk, Cloudinary, SocketIO.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/
